:'''A Notice:''' "About the recent sightings of large Rishboland Tigers:"

==Trivia==
===Etymology ===
* In the Chinese name of Vissudha Field, {{Lang|''Èrjìng''|zh=二净|zh_tl=Double Purification}} refers to {{lang|''Suddhi''|sa=शुद्धि|sa_tl=Purification}}, a inner state which is free from human desires and passions in Buddhism.
